refnamediv.refpurpose: This function converts RGB to CIE 1976 L*a*b*.

listitem.para: It is a list of color values to convert.
The converted color values, returned as a list.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: // to convert the RGB white value to L*a*b. rgb2lab([1 1 1])

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: // to convert the RGB white value to L*a*b. rgb2lab([.2 .3 .4])

refsection.title: Examples
Examples
Examples
refsection.programlisting: // to convert the RGB white value to L*a*b. rgb2lab([23 23 22])

refsection.title: Examples
Examples
refsection.programlisting: // to convert the RGB white value to L*a*b. rgb2lab([34.2 43.3 343.4])

refsection.title: Examples
Examples
Examples
